member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.PivotGrid.Converter.GridCsvExport
member.summary: This class exports the PivotGrid values to Comma Separated Values format. Also we support to export more than one PivotGrid control in a single instance.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.PivotGrid.Converter.GridExcelExport.Export(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports the PivotGrid content into Excel using different export modes like Cell/PivotTable with the specified file name.
member.param: Provides specific file name to the exported Excel document.
Provides whether the cell styles can be ignored from exporting.
member.remarks: When exporting the PivotGrid control with huge amount of rows and columns, Call this method with passing the "ignoreStyles" is true. Then the exporting will be done quickly.
